sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Container, Typography, Button, Box, Grid } from '@mui/material';
import LoginSignupBox from './LoginSignupBox';
import InfoCard from './InfoCard';

function HomePage() {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ backgroundColor: '#e0f2f1', paddingBottom: 4 }}>
      {/* Log-In / Sign-Up Box */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          justifyContent: 'center',
          py: 4,
          backgroundColor: '#c8e6c9', // Light green background for the login section
          borderRadius: 2,
          mb: 4,
        }}
      >
        <LoginSignupBox />
      </Box>

      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          textAlign: 'center',
          py: 5,
          backgroundColor: '#a5d6a7', // A slightly darker green for the hero section
          borderRadius: 2,
          mb: 4,
          color: '#fff', // White text for contrast
        }}
      >
        <Typography variant="h2" gutterBottom>
          Join the Best Online Fishing Tournaments
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" gutterBottom>
          Compete in tournaments from anywhere, anytime. Submit your catches, climb the leaderboards, and win prizes!
        </Typography>
        <Button variant="contained" color="secondary" size="large" sx={{ backgroundColor: '#8eacbb', mt: 2 }}>
          Learn More
        </Button>
      </Box>

      {/* Informational Cards */}
      <Grid container spacing={3} justifyContent="center">
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
          <InfoCard
            title="Sign Up"
            description="Create an account to start participating in online fishing tournaments."
            bgColor="#fff3e0" // Light tan background
            textColor="#3e2723" // Darker text for contrast
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
          <InfoCard
            title="Join Tournaments"
            description="Find and join tournaments that suit your fishing style and preferences."
            bgColor="#fff3e0"
            textColor="#3e2723"
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
          <InfoCard
            title="Submit Catches"
            description="Upload photos of your catches during tournaments and track your progress."
            bgColor="#fff3e0"
            textColor="#3e2723"
          />
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default HomePage;
